General.Name: Jiangsu Liba Enterprise Joint-Stock Co Ltd
General.Description: Jiangsu Liba Enterprise Joint-Stock Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sales of composite materials for household appliances in China and internationally. The company provides film-coated board and organic coating board products for use in refrigerators, washing machines, and other home appliance panels, as well as water heaters, building door panels, and other sectors. Jiangsu Liba Enterprise Joint-Stock Co., Ltd. was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Yixing, China.

3.Name: Jing  Zhou
3.Title: Deputy Gen. Mang. and Sec. of the Board
